channel.title: data factory on menziess blog
channel.description: Recent content in data factory on menziess blog

item.title: Enhance Your Databricks Workflow
item.description: With databricks-connect you can connect your favorite IDE to your Databricks cluster. This means that you can now lint, test, and package the code that you want to run on Databricks more easily:

item.title: Use Key Vault Secrets In Data Factory
item.description: Sometimes it’s useful to get your key vault secret in a Data Factory pipeline (in a secure way).
